articles.title: Refund policy & process
articles.content: We process refunds within 5â€“7 business days after approval. To request a refund, provide order id, amount, and reason. Refunds are returned to the original payment method.

articles.title: Download invoice or receipt
articles.content: Go to Account > Billing > Invoices. Select the month and click 'Download'. If invoice is missing, contact billing with your account email and month.

articles.title: Handling payment failures
articles.content: Payment failures can be caused by expired card, bank declines, or network issues. Try another card, ensure billing address matches, or contact your bank for declines.

articles.title: Change or cancel subscription
articles.content: To change plan: Account > Billing > Manage Subscription. Upgrades are immediate; downgrades may apply at next billing cycle. To cancel, follow the cancel flow and review final charges.
